createPlan.title: Create New Plan
createPlan.subtitle: Build your project plan step by step with our interactive table editor.
createPlan.tipText: Enter multiple predecessors separated by commas (e.g. "1,2,3"). Leave the field empty for starting activities without dependencies.
createPlan.planSaved: Plan saved! (This is a placeholder - actual save functionality will be implemented later)

visualization.title: Network Plan Analysis
visualization.subtitle: Business network plan with critical path and buffer analysis

terms.title: Term Definitions:
terms.eas: EAS/EAF: Earliest Activity Start/Finish - The earliest possible start and finish time of an activity.
terms.las: LAS/LAF: Latest Activity Start/Finish - The latest possible start and finish time of an activity.
terms.totalFloat: Total Float (TF): The time span by which an activity can be delayed without endangering the project.
terms.criticalPath: Critical Path: The path in the network plan consisting of activities without buffer time (TF = 0).

criticalPathDetails.title: Critical Path
criticalPathDetails.warning: Delays in these activities will extend the entire project!

noData.title: No Data Available
noData.message: Please create a plan with activities first.

exportErrors.pngFailed: Failed to export as PNG. Please try again.
exportErrors.jpgFailed: Failed to export as JPG. Please try again.
exportErrors.pdfFailed: Failed to export as PDF. Please try again.
